Article Title: Bill Belichick lands new ESPN role as North Carolina looks ahead after 4‚Äì8 season
Article Text:
Bill Belichick (Image Via Getty)

Bill Belichick returns to TV as ESPN adds him to national title broadcast

Bill Belichick is back on television. Just weeks after finishing a difficult first college football season at the University of North Carolina, the 73-year-old coaching legend has landed a new role with ESPN. The network confirmed that Bill Belichick will appear on the ACC Network‚Äôs broadcast of the College Football Playoff national championship game, set to be played in South Florida at Hard Rock Stadium.The game will feature the Indiana Hoosiers against the University of Miami Hurricanes and is scheduled for a 7:30 p.m. kickoff. ESPN announced that Belichick will be part of the on-air team, marking his return to TV while he continues working as head coach of the Tar Heels in Chapel Hill.ESPN said Bill Belichick will be paired with former Miami and Georgia head coach Mark Richt for the ACC Network‚Äôs coverage.The move comes only weeks after North Carolina ended a rough season with a 4‚Äì8 record, missing both a bowl game and the expanded College Football Playoff.Belichick became North Carolina‚Äôs head coach in 2025, taking his first job at the college level after leaving the New England Patriots following the 2024 NFL season.Before going to Chapel Hill, he spent months on television. He appeared on ‚ÄúMonday Night Football‚Äôs ManningCast‚Äù with Peyton Manning and Eli Manning and also made regular appearances on The Pat McAfee Show.Now, Bill Belichick is mixing both worlds. He is still leading North Carolina‚Äôs rebuild, but he is also stepping back into the media spotlight.ESPN‚Äôs announcement said the move brings ‚Äúone of football‚Äôs greatest minds‚Äù back to the broadcast booth.Bill Belichick is the only head coach in NFL history to win six Super Bowls with one team. He also won two more Super Bowls as a defensive coordinator with the New York Giants.While returning to television, Bill Belichick has stayed busy on the recruiting trail. One of his biggest recent moves was bringing in quarterback Billy Edwards Jr. to Chapel Hill.ESPN‚Äôs Pete Thamel reported that Edwards chose North Carolina after being granted a medical redshirt, giving him one more year of college eligibility.Billy Edwards Jr., a Virginia native, transferred to Wisconsin in August 2025 after playing at Maryland.He later suffered a knee injury and missed the rest of the season. Now, he will compete with Gio Lopez for the Tar Heels‚Äô starting job.He will also work under Belichick and new offensive coordinator Bobby Petrino, another longtime NFL coach.The addition matters for a North Carolina team that struggled badly. The Tar Heels beat only two Power Four teams, Syracuse and Stanford, during the 2025 season.Off the field, Belichick has also faced attention around his personal life, including heavy media focus on his relationship with Jordon Hudson.Despite the noise, sources around the program say Belichick has stayed locked in on recruiting and player development.North Carolina will next hold its spring game on April 12 at Kenan Stadium, where fans will get their first look at the new roster.
Article Summary: Bill belichick will appear on the acc network‚Äôs broadcast of the college football playoff national championship game. The game will feature the indiana hoosiers against the university of miami hurricanes. Espn announced that belichick will be part of the on-air team, marking his return to tv while he continues working as head coach of the tar heels.

Article Title: Bill Elliott and Cindy Elliott combined net worth: NASCAR legacy, career details, lifestyle, and more
Article Text:
Bill Elliott and Cindy Elliott (Image Source: Facebook)

NASCAR achievement, income, and net worth of Bill Elliott

The profile of Cindy Elliott and their net worth

Bill Elliott is one of the most mythical figures in the history of NASCAR, who was a respected person in terms of speed, consistency, and long-term contribution to the sphere of stock-car racing. Awesome Bill of Dawsonville, a former NASCAR Cup Series champion, is a fan favourite, having set performance records throughout his career and making a mark over the decades.Off the track, Elliott has established an enduring brand through endorsement deals and business ventures, helping him achieve significant financial success. His wife, Cindy Elliott, has mostly stayed behind the scenes, yet she has continued to support him in sustaining his career and post-racing legacy projects.The reported net worth of Bill Elliott is approximately $5 million as of 2026, based on his income, sponsorship agreements, and business throughout a long and illustrious career. Once starting at the end of the 1970s, Elliott began ascending to the top in the 1980s, winning the NASCAR Cup Series Championship and several major events, including the Daytona 500 in 1985 and 1987.At the height of his career, Elliott received huge prize money and lucrative sponsorship deals with companies like Harry Mellings, Coors Beer, and Budweiser, which helped raise his profile and augment his income.Upon leaving the full-time competition in the early 2000s, Elliott remained in the sport, doing the odd start, owning teams, and making appearances at events, which further kept him relevant and generated revenue streams. He also ventured into businesses related to automotive and motorsport memorabilia, which added to his general financial landscape.Cindy Elliott's net worth is not publicly recorded because she has been more closely tied to the family and Bill's career than to commercial activities. Although she lives a great lifestyle away from the sports world, Cindy shares a lot of her personal life happenings thrugh her social media handles.The combined net worth of Bill and Cindy Elliott is estimated at $35-$40 million. Their culture is a combination of their racing background, business, and their devotion to the NASCAR community.
Article Summary: The reported net worth of bill elliott is approximately $5 million as of 2026, based on his income, sponsorship agreements, and business. His wife, cindy elliott, has mostly stayed behind the scenes, yet she has continued to support him in sustaining his career and post-racing legacy projects.

The Miami Heat visit the Golden State Warriors on January 19, 2026, for a matchup that carries weight for both teams as the season moves deeper. The game will be played at Chase Center, where Golden State has been steady, while Miami continues a challenging road stretch.Both teams are dealing with injuries that affect rotation decisions and game planning. Several key players are either out or not fully cleared, which puts more responsibility on the healthy core and forces adjustments on both sides.Miami Heat‚Äôs backcourt is short-handed. Tyler Herro is out with a rib injury and did not travel with the team. His absence removes one of Miami‚Äôs main scoring options and limits spacing on offense.Jaime Jaquez Jr. is questionable with a left knee sprain. When available, he has averaged 15.9 points and provided balance on both ends of the floor. Davion Mitchell is also questionable due to a left shoulder contusion, leaving Miami thin at guard.With those concerns, Miami is expected to rely heavily on Bam Adebayo and Norman Powell. Adebayo continues to be a steady presence inside, averaging 17 points and nine rebounds.Powell has been the team‚Äôs most consistent scorer at 23.8 points per game and will likely see extended usage.Golden State Warriors is also missing rotation pieces. De‚ÄôAnthony Melton remains out as he manages his left knee following ACL surgery. Gui Santos will miss his second straight game with a left ankle sprain. Seth Curry is still sidelined due to left sciatic nerve irritation.Draymond Green is listed as probable with a right ankle sprain. His status matters, as his defense and decision-making affect how Golden State controls the game. Stephen Curry is available and expected to lead the offense as usual.Without Herro, Miami‚Äôs offense will depend more on Butler and Powell creating shots against pressure defense. Ball movement and defensive stops will be key if the Heat want to stay close.Golden State, sitting at 24‚Äì19, will lean on home court and shooting. The Warriors are favored by 5.5 points, with the total set at 239.5. If Green plays, Golden State gains an edge defensively. If not, the game could stay tight.Also read: Is Stephen Curry playing tonight vs the Miami Heat? Latest update on the Golden State Warriors star's injury report (January 19, 2026) With injuries shaping both rotations, the game is likely decided by execution and depth rather than lineup strength alone. Golden State Warriors hold the advantage at home, but Miami Heat‚Äôs ability to defend and manage possessions keeps the result open.
Article Summary: The miami heat visit the golden state warriors on january 19, 2026. The game will be played at chase center, where golden state has been steady. Both teams are dealing with injuries that affect rotation decisions and game planning. Stephen curry is available and expected to lead the offense as usual.

Article Title: ‚ÄúShe‚Äôs covering all expenses‚Äù: Taylor Swift goes all out for luxurious bachelorette as Travis Kelce struggles with retirement rumors
Article Text:
Taylor Swift hosts extravagant bachelorette amid Travis Kelce retirement rumors.(Image via PEOPLE)

Taylor Swift focused on celebrating a luxurious bachelorette with her friends amid Travis Kelce‚Äôs retirement rumors



Travis Kelce will make a decision before his wedding to Taylor Swift



Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce‚Äôs wedding has the whole world waiting for it even though the high profile couple have remained tight lipped about it.At this point in time, more than their wedding plans, Travis Kelce‚Äôs retirement speculations have been dominating headlines. But it seems Taylor Swift is fully focused on hosting a luxurious bachelorette for her celebrity friends.A few hours ago, as per OK! Magazine, a source revealed that, "She sees this as a once-in-a-lifetime experience and wants it to stand apart from anything she or her friends have done before‚Ä¶‚ÄùThe source added, ‚ÄúShe has made it clear she will cover every expense herself so the focus stays on enjoyment, not budgets or logistics."As per OK! Magazine, the source continued, "One of the options she has been exploring is taking over an ultra-luxury chalet with a weekly price tag in the region of $250,000‚Ä¶The idea includes flying everyone in privately, bringing in a top-tier chef‚Ä¶‚ÄùThis news comes at a time when Travis Kelce is debating his retirement from the league.For the unversed, unlike the last few seasons, the Kansas City Chiefs failed to perform well in this season.Travis Kelce, the Kansas City Chiefs‚Äô tight end, has also gotten brutally trolled in the last few months as he recorded a pretty average performance on the field.These events have led fans to believe that Travis Kelce might be opting for retirement this year, considering he is turning 37 in October.Travis Kelce has also not denied such rumors as he said, "I've talked to a few people in the facility already, having the exit meetings, and they know where I stand at least right now‚Ä¶There's a lot of love for the game that's still there. I don't think I'll ever lose that. It's a tough thing to navigate‚Ä¶‚ÄùThe Kansas City Chiefs‚Äô tight end continued, "I'll get to be around some friends and family in January instead of trying to figure out how to win some playoff games."
Article Summary: Taylor swift hosts extravagant bachelorette amid travis kelce retirement rumors. One of the options she has been exploring is taking over an ultra-luxury chalet with a weekly price tag in the region of $250,000. The idea includes flying everyone in privately, bringing in a top-tier chef‚Ä¶‚Äù

Article Title: MLK Day Classics: Five iconic NBA performances that made history: Michael Jordan, Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal, Splash Brothers, and more
Article Text:
Michael Jordan, Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson (Image via: Getty Images)

Here are the top five MLK Day performances the NBA has ever seen:

1. Damian Lillard:

2. Gilbert Arenas:

3. Michael Jordan:

4. Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal:

5. Splash Brothers:

Martin Luther King Jr. Day has become one of the most special days on the NBA calendar. Every year, the league schedules games across the country to honor Lt. Dr. Martin Luther King‚Äôs legacy on equality, courage, and unity. Over time, MLK Day games have grown into a tradition, often delivering high-energy performances from some of basketball‚Äôs biggest stars.From legendary former basketball icons to active players, many have used this stage to deliver historic games. Whether it was scoring, shooting, etc, MLK Day has produced moments fans still talk about today. Here‚Äôs a look at five of the greatest individual and team performances ever seen on this meaningful NBA holiday.Damian Lillard delivered the greatest individual performance in MLK Day history in 2020. The Portland Trail Blazers star scored 61 points against the Golden State Warriors. Lillard became unstoppable that day, hitting 11 three-pointers and carrying Portland to an overtime win. It still remains the highest-scoring game ever played on MLK Day.Gilbert Arenas delivered one of the most dramatic MLK Day performances ever.He scored 51 points for the Washington Wizards, including a game-winning three-pointer at the buzzer. Arenas‚Äô confident shooting made this performance unforgettable for viewers and set a new MLK Day scoring record at the time.Michael Jordan reminded everyone why he was the face of the NBA with his MLK Day performance in 1996. Playing for the Chicago Bulls, Jordan scored 46 points against the Washington Wizards, completely taking over the game. At the time, it was the highest-scoring performance ever recorded on MLK Day.It was just his rookie season when Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal delivered an excellent performance on MLK Day with the Orlando Magic. Shaq secured 38 points in a 124-118 loss to the Philadelphia 76ers. Despite losing the game, Shaq‚Äôs exceptional performance made this one of the most dominant performances in MLK Day history.Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson showed to the world why they are known as the Splash Brothers during the Warriors‚Äô MLK Day game against the Cleveland Cavaliers in 2017. The Golden State Warriors were successful in defeating the Cleveland Cavaliers by a massive win, from start to finish. Even though neither of them scored a lot on their own, with Thompson scoring 26 points, and Curry 20 points, however, together, the duo controlled the game and helped turn it into one of the most talked about MLK Days.
Article Summary: Martin luther king jr. day has become one of the most special days on the nba calendar. Every year, the league schedules games across the country to honor dr. martin luther king‚Äôs legacy on equality, courage, and unity. Here are the top five mlk day performances the nba has ever seen.

Article Title: Scottie Pippen‚Äôs ex‚Äëwife Larsa Pippen shuts down dating rumors with rapper LiAngelo Ball, ending bombshell gossip once and for all
Article Text:
Larsa Pippen and LiAngelo Ball. Image via: Getty Images

Larsa Pippen breaks silence on false dating rumor involving rapper LiAngelo Ball

Larsa Pippen is currently dating basketball star Jeff Coby

Social media is a place where even a rumor can quickly turn into a full-fledged story, and this time, Larsa Pippen has made it to the top of all headlines. A few days ago, Pippen fell prey to a deep fake, allegedly featuring her with the rapper LiAngelo Ball. This AI-generated image was posted by some Instagram page, and it immediately caught the eyes of all news channels and Larsa Pippen herself. Fans have been demanding an answer from her since then.Larsa Pippen, who is currently dating the basketball star Jeff Coby, finally decided to shut down a faux dating rumor, thereby putting an end to all the ongoing speculations. Here is what Pippen said while addressing everyone that she is not dating former basketball player LiAngelo Ball.In a recent series of events, Scottie Pippen‚Äôs ex-wife, Larsa Pippen, broke the silence by claiming that she is now dating NBA star LiAngelo Ball. She also urged her fans to stop creating AI deep-fakes and to consider how it could affect someone who is actually not involved. She broke down while commenting, ‚ÄúStop w the fake news‚Äù. Larsa Pippen has been previously involved with Scottie Pippen and Michael Jordan‚Äôs son, Marcus Jordan.The rumor was created based on an AI-generated image, which showed Pippen holding hands and sharing an intimate pose with LiAngelo Ball, calling it a ‚Äúmemorable‚Äù night. Deepfakes today have been a real problem, and Pippen somehow fell prey to them. Shutting down the dating rumor was necessary on her part to claim that she had done nothing wrong.Hollywood actress and Scottie Pippen‚Äôs ex-wife, Larsa Pippen, is currently dating the Haitian basketball player, Jeff Coby. They publicized their relationship back in April 2025, after they made a glamorous appearance at their red carpet debut at the ‚ÄúAccountant 2‚Äù premiere. The couple met in January 2025 at a Miami event, and since then, they have been inseparable.Although the couple decided to marry back in November 2025, no official news about their wedding has been confirmed yet. However, Larsa Pippen was formerly married to the ex-NBA star, Scottie Pippen, from 1997 to 2021, and they share four kids.Also read: ‚ÄúWe needed each other‚Äù: Scottie Pippen‚Äôs ex wife Larsa Pippen breaks silence on her controversial relationship with Future during her marriage
Article Summary: Larsa pippen is currently dating basketball star jeff coby. The couple met in january 2025 at a miami event, and since then, they have been inseparable. Larsa has been previously involved with scottie pippan and michael jordan‚Äôs son, marcus jordan.

Article Title: Russell Westbrook‚Äôs current net worth: Exploring Sacramento Kings point guard's career earnings, contract details, and more
Article Text:
Russell Westbrook (Image via: Getty Images)

Russell Westbrook‚Äôs NBA salary: Net worth, contract details, and more

How Russell Westbrook is a Billionaire by 2029

Russell Westbrook‚Äôs multi-million dollar properties and real estate investments



Russell Westbrook is one of the growing stars in the NBA . Russell was drafted in the NBA draft of 2008 by the Seattle Supersonics, which changed its name to the Oklahoma City Thunder. During his first season with the City Thunder, Russell averaged 15.3 points per game (approx. ), according to ESPN. The Thunder qualified for the NBA Finals in 2012, where Russell scored more than 25 points, while assisting 10 goals in his first NBA Finals game, the first player to do so since Michael Jordan. A nine-time NBA All-Star, Russell was also a part of the Summer Olympics Team that secured a gold medal in 2012. Russell was also the first player since Oscar Robertson to have averaged a triple-double in the 2016-2017 season.Russell Westbrook was first traded by the Houston Rockets in 2019 for Chris Paul. After that, Russell was traded several times - first to the Washington Wizards, then to the Los Angeles Lakers, followed by the Utah Jazz, the LA Clippers, the Denver Nuggets, and is now playing for the Sacramento Kings in the NBA. Russell Westbrook is one of the most high-profile players in NBA history. Over the years, he has earned massive wealth through his NBA contracts, endorsement deals, etc.As a result of his long, successful basketball career, Russell Westbrook has been able to build a massive net worth, making him one of the richest active players in the league.Russell Westbrook's current net worth stands at $300 million, as per Celebrity Net Worth. Russell is believed to be one of the league's richest players, earning his wealth from both his NBA career and through major brand endorsements. In 2017, Russell signed a 10 year contract worth between $150 million -200 million with the Jordan Brand. That same year, he also signed an extension for 5 years worth $205 million (the first player to have signed the largest in the history of the NBA so far). Russell's NBA salary was estimated at around $250 million over his first ten years in the big league, which is believed to have increased to around $350 million.Russell Westbrook has always been involved in real estate. In 2019, Russell sold his LA Beverly Crest home, at an estimated price of $5.35 million, which he purchased back in 2015 for $ 4.65 (approx.), per Celebrity Net Worth, from reality star Scott Disick. In 2022, Russell also put his Brentwood mansion in LA for sale, at around $30 million, which he purchased in 2018 at an estimated rate of $19.75 million. Along with that, Russell also owned a few properties in Oklahoma, one of which, his huge mansion, he put up for sale in 2019, for around $1.7 million. And a year later, in 2020, he also sold his other 3-bedroom house for $0.426 million.
Article Summary: Russell westbrook was drafted in the nba draft of 2008 by the seattle supersonics, which changed its name to the oklahoma city thunder. A nine-time nba all-star, russell was also a part of the summer olympics team that secured a gold medal in 2012.

Article Title: NBA legend Michael Jordan surpasses global heavyweights to claim the richest athlete title
Article Text:
Michael Jordan (Charles Rex Arbogast/AP)

Michael Jordan built his empire through Air Jordan

Global heavyweights chasing the crown

When the debate over the Greatest of All Time erupts in day-to-day conversation and on social media, it usually revolves around rings, MVPs, and clutch shots. However, the financial rankings from Celebrity Net Worth have settled a different kind of GOAT debate: the one happening in the bank. NBA legend Michael Jordan has officially topped the list of the world's richest athletes with a net worth surging past $3 billion, cementing his status as a global sports giant. Other international icons have also made an appearance in the top 10, but the NBA's presence is a testament to how basketball has transcended the rectangle and has become one of the most lucrative businesses.As per Celebrity Net Worth, Michael Jordan currently sits at an estimated net worth of $3.5 billion, making him the richest sportsman in the world. But this staggering wealth didn‚Äôt just come from his legendary NBA career but is the result of a masterclass in marketing and brand building. From his multi-billion-dollar Jordan Brand under Nike to selling the Charlotte Hornets for approximately $3 billion, Michael Jordan has set a blueprint that would be tough to replicate.But he isn't alone in the Top 10, though. LeBron James also sits comfortably at 8th as the only active NBA player in the top tier with a net worth of $1.2 billion.His off-court ventures include the SpringHill Company and strategic stakes in sports teams like Liverpool FC. Also joining this list at 9 is Magic Johnson, whose Magic Johnson Enterprises has turned him into a $1 billion mogul. When you look at the Top 10, the NBA‚Äôs trio, Jordan, LeBron, and Magic, highlights a specific trend: basketball stars are evolving into venture capitalists faster than they can hit a step-back three.While the NBA royalty holds the crown, the rest of the Top 10 is a battlefield of global icons. Names like Cristiano Ronaldo (5th) and Lionel Messi (7th) represent the massive football (soccer) economy, both hovering around the $1.2 billion to $850 million mark. Ending the top 10 is Dwayne ‚ÄúThe Rock‚Äù Johnson with a staggering $800 million net worth.The disparity at the very top is what‚Äôs truly shocking. Jordan‚Äôs $3.5 billion valuation puts him in a level of his own, showcasing how brand power can help you reach the billionaire‚Äôs club long after you have bid goodbye to the hardwood.
Article Summary: Nba legend michael jordan has officially topped the list of the world's richest athletes with a net worth surging past $3 billion. Other international icons have also made an appearance in the top 10, but the nba's presence is a testament to how basketball has transcended the rectangle and has become one of the most lucrative businesses.

Article Title: Patrick Mahomes injury update: Chiefs urged to slow down QB‚Äôs‚Äô comeback after ACL tear
Article Text:
Image via Getty

What happened to Patrick Mahomes?

Why experts want the Chiefs to slow down

Patrick Mahomes needs to 'temper expectations' with injury comeback | Pro Football Talk | NFL on NBC

Patrick Mahomes‚Äô recovery from a serious knee injury has become one of the biggest stories of the NFL right now. The Kansas City Chiefs quarterback tore both his ACL and LCL late in the 2025 season and had surgery in December. While Mahomes hopes to return for Week 1 of the 2026 season, many experts believe the team should not rush his comeback.With the Chiefs entering a crucial rebuilding phase after missing the playoffs, the decision around Mahomes‚Äô recovery timeline could shape their entire season.Mahomes suffered the injury in Week 15 against the Los Angeles Chargers. While trying to extend a play, he was hit and his left knee bent awkwardly. He needed help leaving the field, and later scans confirmed torn ACL and LCL ligaments.The injury ended his season and marked the first major long-term injury of his NFL career. Kansas City finished the year with a disappointing record and failed to make the playoffs for the first time since 2014.Mahomes underwent surgery in mid-December and has been rehabbing under the supervision of the team‚Äôs medical staff. Despite the seriousness of the injury, Mahomes remains confident.In a recent update, he said doctors believe he could be ready for the season opener.‚ÄúI want to be ready for Week 1,‚Äù Mahomes said during a Zoom call. ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs the goal to play with no restrictions.‚ÄùHe added that he hopes to take part in offseason workouts and training camp if his recovery continues to go well.Not everyone agrees with Mahomes‚Äô timeline. Pro Football Talk‚Äôs Mike Florio has urged caution, saying that returning quickly from a late-season ACL tear is very difficult.Florio explained that Mahomes‚Äô playing style makes the situation even riskier. Unlike many quarterbacks, Mahomes relies heavily on movement, scrambling, quick cuts, and throwing on the run. All of this puts extra pressure on the knee.‚ÄúYou want to be very sure that knee is fully healthy before he starts doing all those special things again,‚Äù Florio said.Michael Holley also warned that Mahomes is the kind of player who will try to push himself back early, even if he is not fully ready. Because of this, he believes the Chiefs must protect their star quarterback.For the Chiefs, the bigger concern is not just getting Mahomes back on the field, but making sure he is fully fit for the long term. Kansas City missed the playoffs for the first time since 2014, and the 2026 season is seen as a reset year for the team. Rushing Mahomes back too soon could risk another injury and hurt their future plans.For now, Mahomes remains positive and focused on rehab. But the message from experts is clear: patience may be the smartest move. The Chiefs‚Äô success depends not just on Mahomes returning quickly, but on him returning healthy.
Article Summary: Patrick mahomes tore his acl and lcl late in the 2025 season. He had surgery in december and hopes to be ready for the 2026 season. Many experts believe the team should not rush his comeback. Mahomes relies heavily on movement, scrambling, quick cuts, and throwing on the run.

Article Title: NHL Trade Rumors: Boston Bruins consider long-term deals for Viktor Arvidsson, Alex Steeves after Jonathan Aspirot extension
Article Text:
Jonathan Aspirot (Image Via Twitter)

Why Viktor Arvidsson and Alex Steeves are gaining long-term value in Boston Bruins

Bruins Trade Talks HEATING UP... Bruins Trade IMMINENT | Boston Bruins News

The recent rumors about the NHL related to the Boston Bruins are becoming more and more intense as the team still works on its roster. The securing of Jonathan Aspirot on a new deal has already brought our focus to the other team members whose contracts may be extended, and who have made a positive impact this season. Several players will be free agents within a year, and Boston's management is facing difficult choices ahead as they try to balance current performance, team spirit, and plans effectively.The recent decision of the Bruins to extend Aspirot has sent a straightforward signal: steady performance will receive a reward. According to league watchers and the news circulating, the management is now in the process of determining which players belong in the long-term vision of the organization. There are two players, especially, whose on-ice production and increasing significance within the team make them stand out.Viktor Arvidsson is the name that comes up often when people talk about the potential players to be traded from the Boston Bruins. The 30-year-old winger has made his way into the top six quietly and has been nothing but a dependable asset. So far, in 37 games this season, he has scored 11 goals and made 25 points and has a plus-10.Besides, he is currently enjoying a terrific stint with a point streak stretched to seven games, which consists of four goals and four assists. This period marks an offensive flow and good cooperation with the team‚Äôs main strikers. People in the league think that the veteran's support and regularity will be a good reason for the Bruins to keep him if the conditions are right.The player with the most potential among the impenetrable options is Alex Steeves. Initially, he was considered only as a minor addition to the roster, but soon the perception changed dramatically. So far, in 32 matches with the Boston team, the left winger has scored eight goals and made 14 points, besides being the source of the team‚Äôs physical play. His number of hits - 112 - speaks for the energy and toughness Steeves brings with him on the court during every game, and this is the very quality that the Bruins would like to have in their team during the playoffs when the games are so tight that they have no choice but to pull the trigger. Observers even suggest that his ability to play in different positions and his hard work could be the reasons behind his getting a longer stay with the team.The Bruins are planning to keep more of their important players after securing Jonathan Aspirot already. If the trend of getting good production and consistency continues, then the duo of Viktor Arvidsson and Alex Steeves might be the next ones to get contract extensions.
Article Summary: The bruins are planning to keep more of their important players after securing jonathan aspirot already. If the trend of getting good production and consistency continues, then the duo of viktor arvidsson and alex steeves might be the next ones to get contract extensions.

Article Title: Tampa Bay Lightning‚Äôs Andrei Vasilevskiy Becomes Sixth Goaltender in NHL History With 10 Straight 20-Win Seasons
Article Text:
Andrei Vasilevskiy with the Lightning (Via Getty Images)

Andrei Vasilevsky‚Äôs achievement tops Tampa Bay‚Äôs sensational season with more records

Andrei Vasilevskiy added another prestigious accomplishment to his already impressive resume on Sunday afternoon. The Tampa Bay Lightning goaltender became just the sixth netminder in NHL history to record 10 consecutive 20-win seasons.Vasilevskiy achieved the milestone during Tampa Bay's 4-1 victory over the Dallas Stars at American Airlines Center. The win extended the Lightning's point streak to 13 games while improving their record to 30-13-4 on the season.The 31-year-old Russian joined an exclusive club that includes only Hockey Hall of Famers and future inductees. Henrik Lundqvist, Martin Brodeur, Tony Esposito, Chris Osgood, and Jacques Plante represent the only other goaltenders to accomplish the feat.The company Vasilevskiy now keeps speaks volumes about his sustained excellence since becoming Tampa Bay's starting goaltender. He's posted at least 20 wins in every season since taking over the starting role before the 2016-17 campaign.Vasilevskiy made 19 saves against Dallas to earn his 20th victory of the 2025-26 season. The performance represented another workmanlike effort from the two-time Stanley Cup champion who has been a model of consistency throughout his career.Lightning head coach Jon Cooper praised his team's effort following the victory. "This is game five of a five-game trip. Basically, we played nine games in nine different cities," Cooper said. "For the guys to take all but an overtime loss in one, I've got to tip my cap to them. It's been a pretty good effort by them."Tampa Bay has been one of the NHL's hottest teams throughout the past month. The Lightning have collected points in 13 consecutive games, with Vasilevskiy providing the steady presence in goal that has become his trademark.The victory over Dallas represented a crucial two points against one of the Western Conference's top teams. Dallas grabbed an early 1-0 lead before Tampa Bay rallied with goals from Brandon Hagel and others to secure the win.Forward Darren Raddysh appreciated his team's response after falling behind. "I liked our response," Raddysh said. "We went down one, but we stuck to our game plan and wanted to make them defend. I thought we did pretty well in the first period there and continued in the second and third."Vasilevskiy's consistent excellence has been the foundation of Tampa Bay's success throughout his tenure. Since joining the franchise in 2012, the Russian netminder has slowly cemented himself as one of the league‚Äôs elite goaltenders with two Stanley Cups, one Conn Smythe trophy, and a Vezina Trophy to his name.Even now at 31, he remains as lethal between the pipes as he was during the Lightning‚Äôs back-to-back championship wins back in 2020 and 2021.
Article Summary: Andrei vasilevskiy became the sixth goaltender in nhl history to record 10 consecutive 20-win seasons. The 31-year-old russian joined an exclusive club that includes only hockey hall of famers and future inductees. The win extended the lightning's point streak to 13 games while improving their record to 30-13-4 on the season.

Article Title: Lindsey Vonn‚Äôs Olympic push meets Emma Aicher‚Äôs breakthrough in Italy World Cup super-G
Article Text:
Lindsey Vonn‚Äôs Olympic push meets Emma Aicher‚Äôs breakthrough in Italy World Cup super-G (Image via Getty)

Lindsey Vonn Podiums in ItalyüáÆüáπJust Weeks Before Italian Olympics | Tarvisio Downhill

Emma Aicher wins as challengers rise and risks unfold



Lindsey Vonn, the four-time overall World Cup champion and Olympic gold medalist, delivered another strong performance on Sunday by finishing second in the women‚Äôs World Cup super-G in Tarvisio, Italy. The 41-year-old American earned her seventh podium finish in eight speed races this season, showing a level of consistency no other speed skier has matched as the Winter Olympics draw closer.Lindsey Vonn, the most decorated American alpine skier of all time, missed the win by just 0.27 seconds as Germany‚Äôs Emma Aicher took first place. The race was held on the Prampero course, where fog and poor visibility made conditions difficult, especially on the upper section. With the Milan Cortina Winter Olympics starting in less than three weeks, the result strengthens Vonn‚Äôs position as a top medal contender in downhill and super-G.Lindsey Vonn, known for her experience and control in speed events, led Emma Aicher at every checkpoint before losing time in the final gates. Even with the narrow loss, her worst result this season is still only fourth place. No other skier in the speed events has more than three podium finishes, highlighting how steady and reliable Vonn has been during this high-pressure Olympic season.Emma Aicher, a rising German alpine skier, claimed the super-G victory for her second win of the season and the fourth of her World Cup career. Born in Sweden to a Swedish mother and a German father, Aicher is one of the few athletes who competes in all four alpine skiing disciplines, showing rare versatility at a young age.Emma Aicher, the youngest skier on the podium, finished ahead of a strong and experienced field. Ester Ledecka, the Olympic champion famous for winning gold medals in both skiing and snowboarding, finished third to earn her first podium of the season. France‚Äôs Romane Miradoli placed fourth, while American Keely Cashman achieved the best result of her career by finishing fifth.Alice Robinson, the New Zealand skier who has won multiple races this season, added drama late in the event after crashing into the final gate and hitting the snow hard. Robinson stood up quickly and appeared to avoid serious injury, though she looked shaken after the fall.The women‚Äôs World Cup circuit now moves to Kronplatz in Italy for a giant slalom before one final speed race weekend in Crans-Montana, Switzerland. Italy is also watching closely as Federica Brignone, the defending overall World Cup champion, considers a return after recovering from a serious leg injury.Also Read: Lindsey Vonn stuns fans with shocking body transformation ahead of Winter Olympics 2026 return
Article Summary: Lindsey vonn finished second in the women‚Äôs world cup super-g in tarvisio, italy. The 41-year-old american earned her seventh podium finish in eight speed races this season. Emma aicher, the youngest skier on the podium, finished ahead of a strong and experienced field. Ester ledecka finished third to earn her first podium of the season.

Article Title: Patrick Reed opens up about possible PGA Tour return as he begins 2026 season in Dubai
Article Text:
Patrick Reed opens up about possible PGA Tour return as he begins 2026 season in Dubai (Image via Getty)





Patrick Reed remains ineligible but continues with the worldwide golf plan

Patrick Reed, the 2018 Masters champion and LIV Golf player, said he would consider returning to the PGA Tour if given the chance, calling it the best tour in the world. Reed made the comments in Dubai, where he is starting his 2026 season by playing three DP World Tour events before the LIV Golf season begins next month.Patrick Reed is in the Middle East as part of his goal to compete around the world, a commitment to the DP World Tour and Asian Tour that has helped him remain ranked No. 41 in the Official World Golf Ranking despite LIV Golf events not offering ranking points. Earlier this month, after completing a demanding 32-event season in 2025, Reed was resting when news broke that Brooks Koepka was returning to the PGA Tour through the newly created Returning Member Program, which only Koepka, Cameron Smith, Bryson DeChambeau, and Jon Rahm were eligible for, with the latter three choosing to remain on LIV Golf.Patrick Reed is not eligible for the Returning Member Program because his Masters victory came in 2018, before LIV Golf began. Reed has played on LIV since its first season in 2022 and has one individual victory in 45 starts. Asked at the Dubai Invitational on Saturday if he would return to the PGA Tour if allowed, Reed said he would play everywhere and joked that he is already competing on three tours.Patrick Reed played a full global schedule in 2025, including 14 LIV Golf events, four major championships, 10 DP World Tour tournaments, and four Asian Tour events.Since winning the Masters, Reed has remained competitive in majors, finishing fourth at the 2018 U.S. Open at Shinnecock, 10th at the 2019 Open Championship, top-10 at Augusta in 2020 and 2021, T-4 at the Masters in 2023, and T-3 last year after contending late on Sunday.Patrick Reed is a nine-time PGA Tour winner and received an honorary life membership on the DP World Tour in 2019. Starting in 2026, Reed may need to pay fines for LIV events that clash with DP World Tour tournaments. The fine amounts are unknown, and according to The Telegraph, LIV will no longer pay them. Reed said he is willing to pay and hopes the issue is resolved because he has always wanted to be a worldwide player.
Article Summary: Patrick reed opens up about possible pga tour return as he begins 2026 season in dubai. Reed is not eligible for the returning member program because his masters victory came in 2018, before liv golf began. Starting in 2026, reed may need to pay fines for liv events that clash with dp world tour tournaments.

Article Title: Atlanta Braves add Jorge Mateo to roster after Ha-Seong Kim suffers serious finger injury
Article Text:
Jorge Mateo (Image Via Getty)

Jorge Mateo joins Atlanta Braves after Ha-Seong Kim ruled out for months

Jorge Mateo is officially headed to Atlanta. On Monday, January 19, 2026, the Atlanta Braves agreed to a one-year, $1 million contract with the free-agent infielder and outfielder, the team announced in Atlanta, Georgia. The move comes at a critical time for the Braves, just one day after the team confirmed that shortstop Ha-Seong Kim will miss several months after finger surgery.Ha-Seong Kim suffered a torn tendon in the middle finger of his right hand and is expected to be out for four to five months. With the season approaching and a major gap in the infield, the Braves acted quickly. Signing Jorge Mateo gives Atlanta a flexible player who can cover both the infield and outfield while Kim recovers.The Braves shared on Sunday, January 18, that Ha-Seong Kim underwent surgery to repair a torn tendon in his right middle finger. Doctors expect him to miss most of the first half of the season.Losing their starting shortstop forced the front office to look for fast help, and Jorge Mateo became their answer. Jorge Mateo, 30, brings speed, experience, and defensive range.Six seasons in the big leagues under his belt, he has suited up for both the San Diego Padres and the Baltimore Orioles.Atlanta values his capacity to cover shortstop, second base, or the outfield depending on daily needs by allowing him to move throughout the field.The Braves did not release contract bonuses, but the deal is confirmed as a one-year agreement worth $1 million. The signing allows Atlanta to stay flexible while waiting for Ha-Seong Kim‚Äôs return later in the year.Jorge Mateo‚Äôs 2025 season with the Baltimore Orioles was limited. He appeared in 42 games and recorded 83 plate appearances. He hit .177 with one home run and three runs batted in.His season was interrupted between June 6 and September 5 because of left elbow inflammation, which kept him off the field for nearly three months.Even with those struggles, the Braves see value in Mateo‚Äôs speed and glove. Over his career, Jorge Mateo owns a .221 batting average with 30 home runs and 121 RBIs across stints with the San Diego Padres from 2020 to 2021 and the Baltimore Orioles afterward.His defensive flexibility and baserunning also set him apart, characteristics Atlanta has usually prized. This is a low-risk signing with potential upside for the Braves.Should Mateo settle into his stride, he could become a consistent fill-in as Ha-Seong Kim heals. Otherwise, the short-term agreement lets Atlanta keep investigating possibilities.With spring training nearing, the Braves now turn their focus to reshaping the infield. Jorge Mateo arrives not as a star replacement, but as a needed piece in a moment where depth matters most.
Article Summary: Jorge mateo has agreed to a one-year, $1 million contract with the atlanta braves. The move comes just one day after the team confirmed that shortstop ha-seong kim will miss several months after finger surgery. Mateo brings speed, experience, and defensive range to the braves.

Article Title: Serena Williams net worth timeline (2016 to 2026): Inside her tennis earnings, brand deals, and growing business empire
Article Text:
Serena Williams net worth timeline (2016 to 2026): Inside her tennis earnings, brand deals, and growing business empire (Image via Getty)



Serena Williams early money growth from 2016 to 2018

Serena Williams business moves from 2019 to 2021



Serena Williams retirement shift from 2022 to 2024

Serena Williams net worth status heading into 2025 and 2026



Serena Williams did more than win tennis matches. She turned her success into a powerful money journey. From prize money to business deals, Serena built her wealth step by step. Between 2016 and today, her net worth grew through tennis wins, brand deals, and smart investments. This timeline looks at how her money story changed over the years.In 2016, Serena Williams was already one of the richest athletes in the world. Forbes listed her net worth at around $160 million. Most of her money came from Grand Slam prize money and big brand deals with Nike, Gatorade, and Wilson.In 2017, Serena won the Australian Open while pregnant. Even though she played fewer matches later that year, her income stayed strong. Bloomberg reported her net worth rising close to $180 million, mainly from endorsements.In 2018, Serena made her comeback to tennis and became involved in new brand activities, amongst them, fashion partnerships. Forbes estimated that her net worth was around $200 million at the time.From 2019, Serena focused more on business. She launched Serena Ventures, investing in women-led and minority-owned startups.CNBC confirmed she invested in companies like Lyft and SurveyMonkey.In 2020, even with limited tennis due to the pandemic, Serena earned well through endorsements and business roles. Forbes estimated her net worth at about $225‚Äì240 million.By 2021, she had invested in over 50 startups. Bloomberg reported her net worth moving closer to $260 million, driven more by business than tennis.Serena Williams made her declaration in 2022 that she was ‚Äúevolving away‚Äù from tennis post the US Open. Forbes revealed, that year, her net worth having already achieved about $290 million, thus, she became the richest female athlete in history.Being an active person in business, celebrity and fashion scenes, she was active even more in 2023 and 2024. CNBC and People shared her being engaged with Serena Ventures, brand campaigns, and public appearances as ongoing work.Serena Williams net worth is reported to be beyond the $290 million mark. In 2024, People reported Serena making public appearances, supporting women-focused investments, and attending major sports events.For now, Serena Williams remains one of the richest and smartest athletes ever, built on facts, not guesses.
Article Summary: Serena williams net worth timeline (2016 to 2026): inside her tennis earnings, brand deals, and growing business empire. From prize money to business deals, serena built her wealth step by step. This timeline looks at how her money story changed over the years.

Article Title: Khabib Nurmagomedov net worth timeline (2016 to 2026): How the undefeated fighter from Dagestan built his wealth, global fame and fortune
Article Text:
Khabib Nurmagomedov (Image Via Getty)

How Khabib Nurmagomedov started earning in UFC and built his early net worth (2016 to 2018)

Khabib Nurmagomedov‚Äôs biggest UFC paydays and undefeated peak years (2019 to 2020)

How Khabib Nurmagomedov built his business and money after UFC (2021 to 2025)

Khabib Nurmagomedov‚Äôs net worth in 2026 and what he is doing now

Khabib Nurmagomedov is one of the most loved MMA fighters ever. He was born in Dagestan, Russia. He fought in the UFC and never lost a single match. His career ended with 29 wins and zero losses. Khabib became the UFC lightweight champion and later retired in 2020. Over the years, his money kept growing. He earned from fights, brand deals, and later from business.Back in 2016, Khabib was already popular. But he was still building his career and income. Most of his money came from UFC fight pay and small sponsorships. Fans loved his strong wrestling and calm nature.Everything changed in 2018. Khabib beat Al Iaquinta and won the UFC lightweight title. That win made him a global star.His fight pay increased. Bonus money came in. Bigger brands started calling. From this point, his earnings clearly moved to another level.Khabib‚Äôs biggest money years came next. His fight with Conor McGregor became one of the biggest UFC events ever. Millions watched it.The fight brought Khabib his largest paycheck. After that, he beat Dustin Poirier and Justin Gaethje. Each fight made him richer and more famous.By the time he retired in 2020, Khabib was already worth tens of millions. He walked away as a champion and as one of the highest-earning fighters in UFC history.Retirement did not stop his income. Khabib stayed busy. He became a coach. He trained fighters like Islam Makhachev.He also started his own MMA promotion called Eagle Fighting Championship. Khabib made money from running events, coaching, appearances, and brand partnerships.He also invested in gyms and sports projects. By 2025, most trusted reports placed his net worth around $40 million.In early 2026, Khabib Nurmagomedov is not fighting. But he is still earning. His MMA business, training work, and brand deals continue to bring income.He often appears at big fight events to support his team. Today, his net worth is still counted in the tens of millions.Khabib‚Äôs journey shows that his success did not stop when he left the cage. He turned his fame into long-term wealth through smart moves and hard work.Also Read: Sam Kerr And Kristie Mewis Combined Net Worth: Inside The Football Stars‚Äô Earnings, Contracts, Endorsements, And Life Together
Article Summary: Khabib nurmagomedov is one of the most loved mma fighters ever. He fought in the ufc and never lost a single match. Khabib became the ufc lightweight champion and later retired in 2020. By 2025, most trusted reports placed his net worth around $40 million.

Article Title: DJ Moore draws attention after late overtime mistake and reported absence from locker room following Bears‚Äô playoff exit
Article Text:
DJ Moore (via Getty Images)

A single play overshadows a strong season and raises questions about accountability

The Chicago Bears‚Äô promising postseason run came to a sudden and tragic end Sunday night, and the final moments left a lot to be desired for the team due to crucial mistakes. A 20-17 overtime loss to the Los Angeles Rams in the divisional round shifted the focus from what the Bears accomplished this season to how it ended.Much focus was given to wide receiver DJ Moore, whose role in a crucial overtime miscue infamously drew attention across the league. Adding to the tension, Moore was reportedly not present in the locker room when media interviews began. For a team that leaned heavily on accountability and chemistry throughout its NFC North title run, it was a moment that Bears fans want to forget.The decisive play came on second and eight in overtime, with Caleb Williams releasing a pass that was picked off by Rams safety Kam Curl, setting up the drive that sealed Chicago‚Äôs elimination. The issue appeared to stem from a big miscommunication as Moore ran a vertical route, while Williams expected him to flatten underneath the safety.After the game, Williams addressed the moment directly. He said, ‚ÄúI‚Äôve got to go back and watch it, obviously haven‚Äôt seen it. ... Had D.J. going over the top over all of it. Just a miscommunication between him and I. Tried to flatten him off under the safety, and he kept it vertical, from what I saw in the moment.‚ÄùStill, Moore‚Äôs absence from the locker room did not go unnoticed. Reports quickly spread that he was unavailable when reporters entered, which fueled criticism from former players and analysts. Terrell Owens was among those who believed Moore should have faced the media and addressed the play.On the field, Moore delivered a solid performance, catching five passes for 52 yards and a touchdown on eight targets, while also adding eight rushing yards. Williams finished 23 of 42 for 257 yards, two touchdowns, and three interceptions, while also contributing 40 rushing yards. Neither player had a ‚Äògreat‚Äô night per se, but both were instrumental in Chicago‚Äôs rise this season.
Article Summary: The chicago bears lost 20-17 to the los angeles rams in the divisional round. Wide receiver dj moore's role in a crucial overtime miscue infamously drew attention across the league. Moore was reportedly not present in the locker room when media interviews began.

Article Title: Green Day set to headline Super Bowl LX opening ceremony as NFL blends legacy, culture, and global music
Article Text:
Green Day (via Getty Images)

A hometown band leads a celebration of Super Bowl history and global music

The NFL has officially unveiled a major piece of its Super Bowl LX spectacle, and attendees are sure to get the ‚Äòtime of their lives‚Äô with the new announcement. The legendary rock band Green Day is now confirmed to be headlining the opening ceremony of Super Bowl LX, scheduled for February 8 at Levi‚Äôs Stadium in Santa Clara, California.Green Day‚Äôs involvement carries special meaning as the iconic band was formed in California, and this Super Bowl LX performance becomes a homecoming moment for them. Billie Joe Armstrong expressed his excitement for the same, and the band joins a fantastic list of A-list artists who are set to entertain and thrill audiences on the day.Green Day‚Äôs lead vocalist, Billie Joe Armstrong, shared his enthusiasm for the upcoming performance in a statement, saying, "We are very excited to kick off Super Bowl 60 in our home stadium." The band, which also includes Mike Dirnt and Tr√© Cool, will help honor the legacy of the game while energizing a new generation of fans.The NFL sees this as a landmark occasion, with Tim Tubito, NFL Chief Events Officer, emphasizing the importance of the moment. In his statement, he said, "Celebrating 60 years of Super Bowl history with Green Day as the headlining act, while also honoring NFL legends, is an incredibly moving way to kick off Super Bowl LX.We look forward to creating a collective celebration for fans in the stadium and around the world. "Green Day joins an array of artists, including Charlie Puth, Brandi Carlile, and Coco Jones, who are also part of the opening ceremony lineup, adding a variety of genres and broad appeal for fans. Meanwhile, Bad Bunny will headline the halftime show, a choice that sparked strong reactions when first announced last September.Bad Bunny recently released a promotional video titled "On February 8th, the world will dance." The clip, which highlights his song ‚ÄòUnforgettable Dance,‚Äô featured people from different backgrounds sharing the spotlight. The message of cultural openness resonated widely with fans worldwide, pushing the video past 3 million likes shortly after release.
Article Summary: Green day will be headlining the opening ceremony of super bowl lx. The band was formed in california, and this performance becomes a homecoming moment for them. Bad bunny will headline the halftime show, a choice that sparked strong reactions when first announced last september.

Article Title: Mustafizur Rahman row: Pakistan halts T20 World Cup preparation as it backs Bangladesh over India travel
Article Text:
Bangladesh cricket team. (File photo)

After T20 World Cup Move, Bangladesh Now Bans IPL 2026 Broadcast Amid Mustafizur Rahman Row

The Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) has stopped preparations for the ICC Men‚Äôs T20 World Cup 2026 amid uncertainty over Bangladesh‚Äôs participation in the tournament, scheduled to be held next month in India and Sri Lanka. The move follows Pakistan‚Äôs support for Bangladesh‚Äôs demand that its matches be shifted out of India.According to a report by Pakistani news outlet Geo News, the PCB halted preparations after Pakistan backed Bangladesh‚Äôs decision not to travel to India for its World Cup matches. Pakistan has indicated that it could reconsider its own participation if the issue remains unresolved.The development followed talks between officials from Dhaka and Islamabad on Saturday, during which Pakistan expressed full support for Bangladesh‚Äôs stance, citing security concerns. PCB chairman Mohsin Naqvi, who is also Pakistan‚Äôs interior minister and a Senator, was involved in the discussions.Geo News reported, quoting sources, that Pakistan would review its participation in the tournament if Bangladesh‚Äôs concerns are not addressed.The crisis began after Bangladesh pacer Mustafizur Rahman was withdrawn from the 2026 Indian Premier League on the BCCI‚Äôs instructions, citing unspecified "developments all around."Since then, discussions between the ICC and the Bangladesh Cricket Board (BCB) have failed to produce a resolution.The BCB has stated that Bangladesh will not travel to India for its group matches in Kolkata and Mumbai, citing "security concerns".With the tournament schedule already finalised, the ICC has shown reluctance to move Bangladesh‚Äôs matches to Sri Lanka, the co-host nation, where the India-Pakistan match is scheduled to be held under the existing agreement for ICC events until 2027.If Bangladesh does not take part in the tournament, Scotland is likely to be named as the replacement team based on current rankings. Bangladesh are scheduled to play three league matches in Kolkata and one in Mumbai.The BCB has insisted on either a venue change or a group change so that its matches can be played in Sri Lanka. Bangladesh are currently placed in Group C along with West Indies, Italy, England and Nepal.In its last meeting with ICC officials in Dhaka, the BCB proposed swapping places with Ireland in Group B, which includes Sri Lanka, Australia, Oman and Zimbabwe. This would allow Bangladesh to play all its league matches in Sri Lanka."‚Ä¶the possibility of moving Bangladesh to a different group as a means of facilitating the matter with minimum logistical adjustments was discussed," the BCB said after the meeting on Saturday.While the BCB has said it considers travel to India unsafe for its players, the ICC‚Äôs risk assessment report has not identified any specific or direct threat to the Bangladesh team‚Äôs participation in the tournament.
Article Summary: Pakistan cricket board (pcb) has stopped preparations for the icc men‚Äôs t20 world cup 2026. Move follows uncertainty over bangladesh's participation in the tournament. Pakistan has indicated that it could reconsider its own participation if the issue remains unresolved.

Article Title: ‚ÄòEasier said than done‚Äô: Virat Kohli's brother hits back at Sanjay Manjrekar as star silences critics with another century
Article Text:
Virat Kohli (AP Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Shubman Gill on missed chances, fielding lapses & World Cup preparation after ODI series loss

NEW DELHI: Virat Kohli ‚Äôs bat once again became the loudest response after India lost the three-match ODI series against New Zealand 1-2, with the former captain‚Äôs elder brother Vikas Kohli taking a pointed swipe at critics questioning the great‚Äôs choices late in his career.India went down by 41 runs in the series decider in Indore, but Kohli stood tall amid the collapse, producing a sublime 124 while chasing a daunting 338. Across the three matches, the 37-year-old amassed 240 runs at an average of 80, with scores of 93, 23 and 124, underlining his enduring dominance in the format.The knock came days after former India batter and commentator Sanjay Manjrekar questioned Kohli‚Äôs decision to retire from Test cricket and continue in what he described as the ‚Äúeasy‚Äù format of ODIs. The remark, made during the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney where Joe Root and Steve Smith struck centuries, drew widespread criticism from fans.Vikas Kohli joined the chorus on Sunday, soon after Virat registered his 54th ODI hundred and 85th international ton. In a post on Threads that has since gone viral, he aimed a sharp barb at Manjrekar. ‚ÄúI wonder if Mr Expert of cricket has some suggestions for the easiest form of cricket.You need to be there to do that. Anyways, as I said, Easier said than done,‚Äù he wrote.The numbers back the sentiment. In Kohli‚Äôs last six ODIs, he has scored three centuries and two half-centuries. He also struck a hundred and a fifty for Delhi in the Vijay Hazare Trophy, silencing doubts about his motivation after stepping away from Tests.Kohli will next feature in India colours in July 2026 during the England ODI tour. Before that, he will turn his focus to IPL 2026, aiming to help Royal Challengers Bengaluru defend their title.
Article Summary: India lost the three-match odi series against new zealand 1-2. India went down by 41 runs in the series decider in indore. Kohli stood tall amid the collapse, producing a sublime 124. The 37-year-old amassed 240 runs at an average of 80.
